Elegua (Yoruba) bụ Orisha, chi nke okporo ụzọ n'okpukpe Santería, Winti, Umbanda, Quimbanda
Holy Infant of Atocha, na Candomblé.
A maara Elegua dịka Èpande-Nego n'okpukpe Yoruba ma nwee njikọ chiri anya na Eshu
Elégbára pụtara "Onyenwe nke ike" na-asụsụ Yoruba
A maara Eleguá (Legba) na Dominican Republic, Haiti, Colombia, Cuba na Puerto Rico dịka orisha na "onye nwe" caminos, maọbụ okporo ụzọ na ụzọ
Emume na nhunye niile dị na Santería ga-ebu ụzọ nweta nkwado nke Eleguá tupu ọ gaa n'ihu
N'ime "Regla de Ocha" [Cuba], ọ dịtụ iche na Echu, onye a na-ahụ dịka nwanne ya nwoke, site n'inwe àgwà ndị na'adịghị ize ndụ na ndị dị obere
Eleguá na-agagharị n'ụzọ dị jụụ; n'ụzọ megidere nke ahụ, Echu "na-agbapụ"
Ihe ngosi nke Eleguá gụnyere Akefun, Aleshujade, Arabobo, Awanjonu, Lalafán, Obasín, Oparicocha, na Osokere.
E nwere patakí (akụkọ) na Santería nke Olodumare nyere Eleguá mkpịsị ugodi nke oge gara aga, ugbu a, na ọdịnihu; n'ihi nke a na-egosikarị Elequá na ọ na-ejide mkpụsị igodo
E nwere ike itinye onyinyo Eleguá n'ụlọ n'azụ ọnụ ụzọ mbata.
N'okpukpe Afro-Brazilian Elegbara bụ otu n'ime utu aha nke Exu.
